title: 'Moving Type' animation
content:
Hello,

Just thought some of you might be interested in  
this animation short I've produced.

It's full title is 'Moving Type - Exploring the  
Expressive & Illustrative Potential of Letterforms',  
which is just about all you need to know really.

You can see a short low-res version here:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOiNG2TCeXQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145037/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOiNG2TCeXQ "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOiNG2TCeXQ")

Any suggestions or feedback appreciated.

Cheers,

Seb
author: Seb Lester
